text:
The future royal sisters-in-law are apparently pretty different ... or at least, that’s what Kate Middleton and Meghan Markle’s handwriting suggest!

Handwriting expert Jamie Mason Cohen studied samples of Meghan and Kate's writing, revealing stark differences in their personalities. Cohen told The Daily Express that the Duchess of Cambridge’s writing shows her to have strong control of her emotions, specifically her temper. Kate, 36, apparently also knows how to pick her battles.

While Cohen says Kate’s pretty restrained and proud of it -- he believes Prince Harry’s fiancé is more emotional.

“[Meghan] also shows strong pressure in her strokes, a sign of strong energy and feelings that run deep.”

Not only that, but he thinks her writing shows that she loves being the center of attention. An actor who loves attention? Does she also enjoy memorizing words and repeating them in front of a camera?

But forget about Kate versus Meghan -- more importantly -- Cohen believes Meghan and Harry could be facing problems.

Based on their writing, the soon-to-be-married pair actually have opposing personalities.

For more on Duchess Kate and Meghan Markle, watch the video above.
title: Expert: Meghan Markle and Duchess Kate's handwriting reveals major difference
